post.body: wonders what Special Dark & Mrs. Goodbar are doing...
is definately going to watch that Int'l dance competition Sunday night, lol. Does Denmark have a dance team?
is glad CNBC finally agreed w/me. Houses are same price as 2004. SO if ur job is secure, BUY in 2009! If u bought before '04 & need more hom
can't belive oil is $38 a gallon! Hope there is a cease fire in middle east:(
can't believe I still get told what to wear! Found out I am too attractive to list homes owned by single or divorced women... :(
is of course, running late!
watching WANTED w/mom, dad & the boys. So far its pretty darn good!
is putting together a puzzle w/my dad & Jeffrey. Family time is free, yet priceless:D
gonna pick up something for kids to eat & drop by Terry's.
still not sure what I want to do NYE. Can't believe it's here already!!!
wants something sweet...think I'm going through after Christmas sugar slump, lol! Hmmm...must add "loss 20 lbs" to New Years resolution list
is starving! Should have had breakfast...I need a break:D
is running late again...get so focused on CNBC! It's going to be a great day:D
can't believe Chargers won, Cowboys & Bucs lost...this is gonna be an amazing play off season!
heading home...stop by if you are close! No fuss, just vegging w/Tivo!
just finished Sunday dinner w/21+ family & friends....stopping by Jrs then home!
enjoys family BBQ's! Angelony & the Simms clan is mixing & mingling:D
is eating shrimp & cheering for Cowboys!
is cooking dinner...Great Kick! Go Vikings*
is being driven by Jeffrey, heading to Angelony's for cookout! Tony's smoking meat!!!
